options.name: Desert Wraps
options.description: These people typically wear leather wraps that protect them from the harsh desert and whipping sands. Gain +1 Physical Mitigation when wearing Light Armor.

options.name: Path of the Sunscholar
options.description: The sunscholars dedicate themselves to the flame and finding the knowledge within. Learn 2 Beginner and Novice Pyromancy Spells and gain +1 Academics

options.name: Path of the Sundancer
options.description: The sundancers achieve ultimate form to attain knowledge. Gain +1 Acrobatics and +1 Athletics

options.name: Unforgiving Nights
options.description: These people are acclimated the warm days in the desert, but they have learned to endure the long, cold nights. Gain +3 Cold Mitigation and +1 Resilience.

options.name: Bloodless Weaponry
options.description: The Arah-ka society train with weapons that do not scar skin as to not desecrate themselves. Gain +1 Attack and Damage on Bludgeoning Weapons and Unarmed Attacks.

options.name: Legacy of Knowledge
options.description: Many within the Arah-Ka culture dedicate themselves to continued learning and spellcraft. Gain +1 Scribing and become Good at one Knowledge Skill.

options.name: Action : Ritual Dagger
options.description: You perform the ultimate offense in the Arah-Ka culture and make an Attack with a Light 1-Handed Piercing Weapon made of glass, causing the Target to gain the Bleeding Condition. Add an additional 1d10 Damage to any Physical Damage you do while the Target has the Bleeding Condition on it.
